response.overview: 2023 has been declared the year of the teacher and mentor. A documentary about the Center for Social Adaptation of Youth "Gran", which is headed by Mikhail Mikhailovich Nepogodin, a graduate of the Khabarovsk Pedagogical Institute. The Gran Center is the only organization in the Khabarovsk Territory that has a successful trusting experience of working with pupils and administration of orphanages. The social, pedagogical, environmental, sports and tourism activities of the Gran Center and personally Mikhail Nepogodin are a powerful tool for educating children and adolescents. The "Edge" largely models situations and relationships between people that a child will encounter in adulthood.
response.title: Edges of Good
